text:
I'm really sorry...
I ended up damaging the costume like this...

It's alright.
If we mend it from the inside, it won't be noticeable.

I apologize for the trouble.
If there are any issues, please let us know immediately.

No, no, that's what we're here for.
We'll fix it in the next few days.

Producer, I'm sorry...
I made you apologize for something that's my fault.

It’s an important costume.
I should have been more careful...
Yeah, you definitely need to reflect on that.

But, it's also important not to get too down about it.
Show us a performance that's true to Kogane.

—You're right. I need to do what I can!
I'll do my best!
